rows.label: qev011401_MSG0001
rows.name: Well, that's another day shot...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0002
rows.name:
Counting back from the deadline, that's...
nowhere near enough time. Yiiiiikes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0003
rows.name:
And if you screw this up, no one'll ever trust you with
another assignment. Girl, you are hosed. So hosed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0004
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0005
rows.name: Oh. Hey there, [ST:playername ]...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0006
rows.name:
Thanks again for before. My Skell's running good as
new again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0007
rows.name:
That said, I've been sitting here taking a long, hard
look at the deadlines on the assignments I've taken,
and...it ain't pretty.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0008
rows.name: So now I'm figuring out my next move.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev011401_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask May about what her current assignments involve.

rows.label: qev011401_JNK0020
rows.name: Assist

rows.label: qev011401_SEL0021
rows.name: Offer to lend May a hand on her current assignments.

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0009
rows.name: Hmm, let's see...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0010
rows.name:
I've got one to gather a couple magical finding rods...
and a pair of redwood aprica antlers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0011
rows.name:
Another to collect two ebony evello eggs... 
I hate dealing with those birds, but what can you do?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0012
rows.name:
Then there's one to gather 80 angel stones. Eighty!
Ha ha...haaaa.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0013
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0014
rows.name: But I said I'd do 'em, so I have to figure something out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0015
rows.name: No epiphanies yet, but I'll come up with something.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0016
rows.name:
Thanks, though. I mean, for taking the time to talk to
me again. It really made my day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0017
rows.name: Oh, gosh, no... I couldn't ask that of you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0018
rows.name:
Huh? BLADE is a team, and members of a team help
each other out?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0019
rows.name: Wow, I... That's really kind of you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0020
rows.name:
I feel like a monster for asking, but...could I maybe
lean on that kindness one more time?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0021
rows.name:
Right now I've got one assignment to gather a
couple of magical finding rods and a pair of
redwood aprica antlers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0022
rows.name:
I also have another especially nasty assignment that
requires 80 angel stones.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0023
rows.name:
Oh, and then a third one to find two ebony evello
eggs. No matter how you look at it, that's more than
one person can handle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0024
rows.name:
So, um...could I maybe ask you to get the ebony
evello eggs and then either the redwood aprica antlers
or the magical finding rods?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0025
rows.name:
If you can manage that for me, I swear I'll finish the
rest off myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_JNK0110
rows.name: Redwood Aprica Antlers

rows.label: qev011401_SEL0111
rows.name: Offer to find the two redwood aprica antlers.

rows.label: qev011401_JNK0120
rows.name: Magical Finding Rods

rows.label: qev011401_SEL0121
rows.name: Offer to find the two magical finding rods.

rows.label: qev011401_JNK0130
rows.name: Eighty Angel Stones

rows.label: qev011401_SEL0131
rows.name: Offer to find all those angel stones.

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0026
rows.name: Thank you so much![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0027
rows.name:
I'll leave the two ebony evello eggs and
two redwood aprica antlers to you, then.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0028
rows.name:
And I'll get those angel stones together.
All...80 of them. Somehow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0029
rows.name: Thank you so much![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0030
rows.name:
I'll leave the two ebony evello eggs and
two magical finding rods to you, then.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0031
rows.name:
And I'll get those angel stones together.
All...80 of them. Somehow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0032
rows.name:
What? Oh no! No way! That is way too much!
I don't want that kind of debt weighing on my soul.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0033
rows.name:
I'll get those angel stones together myself, or die trying!
But if you could help with some of the other stuff,
that'd be huge.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0034
rows.name:
Maybe the two ebony evello eggs?
Oh, and the two magical finding rods, maybe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0035
rows.name:
I don't know what to say. I'm just so floored at your
generosity. Thank you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0036
rows.name:
I'll leave gathering the two ebony evello eggs and
two redwood aprica antlers to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0037
rows.name: And I'll finish the rest so your generosity isn't wasted.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0038
rows.name: How's your gathering work coming along?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0039
rows.name:
Things are surprisingly good on my end! I peeked into
a cave I happened upon down by the shore...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0040
rows.name:
and I came out with 75 angel stones!
Not half-bad, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_JNK0210
rows.name: Boggle

rows.label: qev011401_SEL0211
rows.name: Show surprise at May's unbelievably good fortune.

rows.label: qev011401_JNK0220
rows.name: Doubt

rows.label: qev011401_SEL0221
rows.name: Express doubt at May's story.

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0041
rows.name:
Whoa, come on, it's not THAT crazy. These things
happen to everyone, right? ...No? Just me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0042
rows.name:
What? No! I mean, yes! It's the truth! Why would
I possibly lie about something like that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0043
rows.name: Stuff like this just happens to me. Always has.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0044
rows.name:
Back in third grade on Earth, I found this backpack in
the woods on my way home from school. Opened it up
and found 100,000 bucks![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0045
rows.name:
A TV crew came to my house and everything.
Super embarrassing, actually...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0047
rows.name:
Er, sorry. Still on assignment here.
Focus, May! Focus![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0048
rows.name:
Um, so where are you at with the two ebony
evello eggs and two redwood aprica antlers,
[ST:playername ]?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0049
rows.name:
Whoa, really? Wow! How embarrassing...
Not only do I not have all the angel stones yet...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0050
rows.name:
but I still haven't found the two magical finding rods
I need, either.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0051
rows.name: Talk about useless. I'm really letting you down here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_JNK0310
rows.name: Assist

rows.label: qev011401_SEL0311
rows.name: Offer to collect the rest of the required items.

rows.label: qev011401_JNK0320
rows.name: Scold

rows.label: qev011401_SEL0321
rows.name: Tell May to stop berating herself.

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0052
rows.name: Oh, no, I couldn't possibly ask you to...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0053
rows.name:
Hey, wait. Insisting on doing everything myself is what
got me into this mess in the first place, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0054
rows.name:
I know, I know... BLADE is a team, and we should all
help each other out... Right. I get that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0055
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0056
rows.name: Thanks for caring enough to get mad.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0057
rows.name:
This part of me is probably why I've had so much
trouble with others in the past.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0058
rows.name: All right. Maybe I can ask you for help one more time?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0059
rows.name:
I'll get the remaining angel stones together, no matter
what it takes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0060
rows.name:
If you could bring me those two magical finding rods,
I would really, really appreciate it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0061
rows.name:
This is my first time working together with someone
on assignments like this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0062
rows.name:
It's funny... I feel a hundred times more determined
to do my share of the work than usual.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0063
rows.name:
Anyway, to recap: you get the magical finding rods,
and I'll get those angel stones, whatever it takes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0064
rows.name:
Hi, [ST:playername ]! How's it, um...
How's it coming along?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0065
rows.name: Were you able to gather those magical finding rods?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0066
rows.name: YESSS![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0067
rows.name:
Here, look! I found the rest of my angel stones, too!
We did it! The assignments are complete![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0068
rows.name:
When my Skell got wrecked, I figured there was no
chance I could finish these...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0069
rows.name:
It's amazing. Who knew you could get this much done
working with a partner?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0070
rows.name:
I've worked alone all this time, but now I finally
understand why people enjoy working in teams.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_JNK0410
rows.name: Affirm

rows.label: qev011401_SEL0411
rows.name: Affirm that teamwork is key.

rows.label: qev011401_JNK0420
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev011401_SEL0421
rows.name: Take the credit for yourself.

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0071
rows.name:
Yeah, I finally see that! Before, I barely managed a
conversation with the other members of my division...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0072
rows.name:
But now, I think it's time I take a chance on real,
honest cooperation![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0073
rows.name:
Thanks for everything. I look forward to teaming up
with you again sometime![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0074
rows.name: Whaaat?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0075
rows.name:
I mean, yeah, that's pretty much true, but still...
Harsh. So harsh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0076
rows.name:
Boy, I never expected the conversation to head
in THIS direction...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0077
rows.name:
Um...so, okay, I guess? Does that mean I should stick
it out on my own?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_JNK0510
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev011401_SEL0511
rows.name: Tell May that her exceptional luck is all she needs.

rows.label: qev011401_JNK0520
rows.name: Change

rows.label: qev011401_SEL0521
rows.name: Admit that you think teamwork is indeed better.

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0078
rows.name:
Is my luck really that good? I always figured this
was just normal...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0079
rows.name:
I guess I can't deny there's an ease to working alone.
Plus it keeps me from being a burden on folks like you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0080
rows.name: Okay. I'll try to keep the lone-wolf thing going, then.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0081
rows.name:
But, uh... If we do bump into each other again,
I hope we can at least chat or something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0082
rows.name:
Er, right...? Ha ha! Yeah, working on assignments with
you has proven to me that teamwork is better, as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0083
rows.name:
I think it's time I take a chance on real, honest
cooperation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011401_MSG0084
rows.name:
Thanks for everything! I look forward to teaming up
with you again sometime![ST:wait ]
